page.title: 14Ladock Parish Church
page.content: The church of St. Ladoca, Ladock is in the diocese of Truro. The parish has 47 farms; there are 2 churches in the parish, the parish church and the village church at Grampound Road which is shared with the Methodists. The parish is part of the Probus Team which consists of the parishes of Probus, Creed, Ladock and St.Erme which all share 2 priests. There are 23 names on the War Memorial in the churchyard.There are about 4 burials a year. The granite tower was built in the l450's and is about 90 m high.The church could seat 300, there are notable painted panels on the altar: the famous windows are by Wm. Morris, there is a Jacobean screen and a Willis organ.The average attendance at the Sunday Eucharist is 26,much the same as 20 yrs.ago.There are about 5 baptisms and 3 weddings each year. .
